column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=First I sat down and made a list of all the food I would need for the next week .
#text=I grabbed my reusable shopping bags and the list , grabbed my wallet and car keys , then started up the car and drove to the store .
#text=When I got to the store I went and grabbed a shopping cart , then I went straight to the produce aisle and got all the fruits and vegetables on the list .
#text=Then I worked my way to the opposite end of the store , making sure to grab everything that was on my list .
#text=As I went through the store I picked up the things on my list and put them into my shopping cart .
#text=When I had everything I went up to the checkstand and placed the items onto the conveyer belt , so the person could scan them and ring me out .
#text=After the cashier had totaled up my bill , I handed him my money and he handed me back my change .
#text=He put all the groceries into my bags for me , then I carried them out to the car and went home .
